response.content:
Dear Charles,
The whole course is about JavaScript so the environment is also important. Also about the course accurate description there is a curriculum what we will cover and what I have there I have it in the course there is nothing less, there is much more I promise. So sorry to hear that you didn't expect to start it like this but I mentioned that in the beginning so we can forget about what we need to follow the course.
Thanks
